title: "Asean digital ministers pledge cooperation to fight cybercrime, control AI"
excerpt: "SINGAPORE: Digital ministers of Asean nations on Thursday (Feb 1) pledged to come up with a code of ethics to control the development Artificial Intelligence (AI) and also reaffirmed their commitment to cooperate in the fight against cybercrimes."
